key_points: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle featured on Time 100's most influential people issue cover.
The list includes figures like Billie Eilish, Britney Spears, and Simone Biles among others.
Harry and Meghan are highlighted among the honorees with a worldwide cover.
Time's editor in chief stated the list features leaders working towards a better future.
The list comprises 54 women and includes political figures like President Joe Biden, Vice President Kamala Harris, and former President Donald Trump.
Harry and Meghan left royal duties and Britain in 2020, pursuing independent projects and charitable work.
Chef Jose Andres penned a tribute to Harry and Meghan's active compassion and refusal to remain silent on issues.
Britney Spears is recognized for her fight against her conservatorship and her resilience.
Paris Hilton, in a tribute to Spears, highlighted her joy and spirit amidst personal struggles.
Megan Thee Stallion praised Billie Eilish for her uniqueness, self-advocacy, and support for women.
spokespersons: Edward Felsenthal (editor in chief, Time magazine)
Jose Andres (chef, founder of World Kitchen nonprofit)
